sentence.text: In order to expand the mutation spectrum of the causative genes in Chinese adult population, we investigated three genes, eye development, negative regulation of cell proliferation and negative regulation of very-low-density lipoprotein particle clearance, in a cohort of 187 independent Chinese patients with high myopia.

entity.text: negative regulation of very-low-density lipoprotein particle clearance

sentence.text: Our cellular response to interleukin-4ings will not only augment the mutation spectrum of these three genes, but also provide insights of the contribution of these genes to adult high myopia in Chinese.
